data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Prilep, North Macedonia to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Prilep, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Prilep, North Macedonia know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 599 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Prilep.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 128 believers in Prilep, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Albanian, Macedonian people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, it’s possible most of the 29,205 lost people in  Prilep, North Macedonia have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: There are 76,800 people living in the state of Prilep. Only about 128 might be believers.

data.section_summary:
the state of Prilep, North Macedonia has a population of 76,800.

We estimate Prilep has 128 people who might know Jesus, 47,467 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 29,205 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 599 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Prilep, North Macedonia.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.
